overview: A Colorful documentary about Jimmy Olger, proprietor of Olger's Store and Museum in Sutherland, Va., 30-odd miles south of Richmond. A cook of regional foods who uses a traditional black kettle and open-pot style of cooking, Jimmy Olger is locally known as "The King of Brunswick Stew." His other specialties include beef stew and turtle soup. The film includes a look around the inside of his amazing store/museum.
title: Lord Have Mercy: Olger's Store
